pkgmetadata.longdescription: Import, Manipulate and Explore the Results of an 'Antares' Simulation // Import, manipulate and explore results generated by 'Antares', a powerful software developed by RTE (Rseau de Transport dlectricit) to simulate and study electric power systems (more information about 'Antares' here : https://antares.rte-france.com). You can see the results of several ANTARES studies here : http://bpnumerique.rte- france.com/.
